pages.text:
Our Namesake
In a region of France, which produces the world’s best bubbly, you can find our namesake: the vineyard village of Bouzy. This town, with less than a thousand residents, lives in perpetual celebration of champagne. We like their style.
Bouzy blends elevated elegance with poppy effervescence to embody the timeless spirit of our favorite drink.  Pop the perfect bottle so that you can toast tonight, any night.
Contact us.
contact@bouzytampa.com
(813) 550-2560
